title: Latest updates: East Midlands Live Tuesday 28 November 2017 - BBC News
summary: harry and meghan to visit nottingham .
men not guilty of megan bannister manslaughter .
newark 'the worst place to grow up poor ' .
tyler walker signs new forest deal .

text: julius caesar 's invasion site 'uncovered '

documents.title: ledley signs extended derby contract
text: ledley signs extended derby contract

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: dedicated live coverage on this page has now ended for the day , although some news , sport and travel updates will be posted automatically overnight .
east midlands live returns from 08:00 tomorrow morning .

documents.title: armed robbery at leicester shop
text: an armed robber threatened staff with a gun before making off with cash , leicestershire police said .
armed officers were called to the one stop shop on evington road at about 04:20 this morning after reports of the raid but nobody was caught .
the man stole cash before making off on foot towards beckingham road .
no one was injured during the robbery .
officers would like to speak to anyone who may have been in the evington road area at that time and may have seen the suspect .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: two-week firearm surrender 'success '
text: a total of 123 firearms and more than 1,500 rounds of ammunition have been handed in to leicestershire police during the national two-week surrender .
more than 100 of these weapons were handed in at a police station .
among the weapons handed in were revolvers , pistols , handguns , rifles and shotguns .
although gun crime is low in leicestershire we must never forget that firearms are extremely dangerous , and can be deadly if they get into the wrong hands .
this surrender has ensured that these weapons will now be deactivated or destroyed . ''
people who surrendered firearms will not automatically be charged , but could face prosecution if they are later connected to a crime .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cricket : notts outlaws to open 2018 t20 blast
text: reigning champions notts outlaws will kick-off next year 's t20 blast against birmingham bears at trent bridge .
the match , a repeat of this year 's final , is on wednesday 4 july and is the start of a 45-day group stage .
leicestershire foxes open their campaign away to northamptonshire on the same night , with derbyshire falcons beginning two days later , at home to lancashire .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man in van 'approaches schoolgirl '
text: police are increasing patrols around the chaddesden area of derby after an 11-year-old girl reported being approached by a man as she walked home from school .
it 's thought to have happened on monday afternoon .
a van pulled up alongside the girl and a man got out .
the child ran away and told her parents when she got home .
we are stepping up patrols in and around the area tonight and over the coming days - as well as speaking to local schools to reiterate safety advice to pupils .
i am also urging drivers who were in the area at the time to check any dash cam footage that may have images of the man involved. ``
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: accident recovery work on m1
text: here is situation on # m1 north j27 - j28 # derbyshire at moment we 've some accident recovery work to be completed and debris clearance from nearside of carriageway .
2 lanes open 30min delays from j27
something happens between junctions 25-28 everyday .
we do n't need smart motorways , we need smart drivers
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: harry and meghan 'to meet nottingham public on friday '
text: prince harry and meghan markle 's visit to nottingham on friday will begin with a civic reception , kensington palace has said .
the reception for the prince and ms markle will be held at the national justice museum .
they will then go on a walkabout where they will be able to greet members of the public as an engaged couple for the first time .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: details emerge of harry and meghan 's nottingham visit
text: friday 's visit of prince harry and meghan markle to nottingham will allow the prince to introduce her to a `` community that has become very special to him , '' kensington palace has said .
the prince and ms markle , 36 , will visit a terrence higgins trust world aids day charity fair and speak to staff and mentors at nottingham academy .
the couple will find out about the school 's full effect programme , which helps young people turn away from violence and crime .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: selby takes confidence from 2016 triumph
text: selby takes confidence from 2016 triumph
author: Owen Phillips
BBC Sport

documents.title: breakingharry and meghan 's first engagement will be in nottingham
text: prince harry and meghan markle will carry out their first official engagement together in nottingham on friday , kensington palace has said .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : rugby teams dismantle posts with scrum
text: the full power of a rugby club 's scrum was demonstrated on saturday when it knocked over the posts .
hinckley rugby club , who play in english rugby 's fourth tier , drove opponents luctonians back towards their own tryline , wiping out the goalposts in the process .

club chairman john tilley said : `` i did n't really think anything of it until the post started falling down , the bloke behind ran for cover and then i just thought 'well there 's £ 7,000 gone like that ' .
`` we did n't score either . ''
the match was moved to an adjacent pitch and hinckley ran out 52-12 winners .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: mouse droppings found inside restaurant oven
text: a restaurant in leicester has been banned from preparing food after mouse droppings were found throughout the building - including inside the oven .
shere punjab in melton road was inspected by leicester city council on thursday last week .
they found the `` dirty conditions '' that were posing a risk to safety .
mouse droppings were found around the freezer , fridge toilet and hand wash basin .
they were also seen on a chapati pan , an oven shelf and the bottom of an oven .
as well as mouse droppings the inspector found `` long standing '' dirt and debris over the kitchen .

the dirty conditions and evidence of mouse activity our officers found at shere punjab were sufficient to request a prohibition order , preventing the restaurant from preparing any more food until it addresses the problems .
magistrates granted that order at court this week .
officers will be making a return visit to shere punjab to ensure the restaurant has carried out the work needed before it is allowed to reopen . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: pair cleared of schoolgirl 's manslaughter
text: pair cleared of schoolgirl 's manslaughter

documents.title: tuilagi in line for tigers comeback
text: tuilagi in line for tigers comeback

documents.title: grenade handed in as part of firearms surrender
text: more than 245 items of firearms and ammunition have been handed into nottinghamshire police during a nationwide two-week surrender .
some of the items handed in included old war rifles , a shotgun disguised as a walking stick , and even a hand grenade .
`` i 'd like to take this opportunity to thank everyone who handed in a weapon during the surrender , '' assistant chief constable steve cooper said .
`` your weapons can now no longer fall into the wrong hands and be used to harm or threaten people in nottinghamshire . ''
author: East Midlands Today

documents.title: megan bannister : father pays tribute to daughter in court
text: in a statement read out to court megan bannister 's father said : `` the silence without megan in our lives is deafening .
`` she was the heart of her family . ''
the teenager had mdma in her system when her body was found in the back of a car that crashed in enderby in may this year .
today jason burder , from braunstone avenue , and adam king , from waltham avenue , leicester were found not guilty of gross negligence manslaughter .
burder admitted supplying ms bannister with mdma and three other drugs offences .
king admitted being concerned in the supply of mdma .
author: Victoria Hicks
Reporter, East Midlands Today

documents.title: afternoon weather update
text: expect plenty of sunshine this afternoon but cloud will increase over the course of the day .
some showers may move southwards later on this afternoon - highs of 5c ( 41f ) .
author: Alex Hamilton
BBC Weather

documents.title: rugby : ex-leicester forward 's 'brutal ' retirement
text: former leicester , england and british & irish lions forward tom croft says being forced to retire because of injury has been hard to accept .
the 32-year-old won the premiership title four times with the tigers and played 40 times for england , but quit the game last month on medical grounds .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: walker signs new forest deal until 2021
text: walker signs new forest deal until 2021

documents.title: fingerprints 'impossible ' to erase with new technology
text: scientists at loughborough university claim to have created forensic technology making it impossible '' for criminals erase their fingerprints from crime scenes .
they 've developed an advanced detection technique allowing investigators to take prints from more difficult exhibits .

this advancement opens up possibilities for evidence retrieval in situations where traditional methods either struggle or fail completely - for example , when attempts have been made to destroy print evidence through burning or washing . ''
the technology will now be refined for commercial use .
it was created in partnership with the defence science and technology laboratory ( dstl ) - part of the ministry of defence .
the lead scientist on the project said the technology made it impossible '' for criminals to eliminate fingerprint evidence .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: tyler walker : forward signs new forest deal
text: nottingham forest forward tyler walker has signed a new long-term deal to stay at the city ground , the club has announced .
walker , 21 , who joined the reds as an eight-year-old , has made 10 appearances this season , scoring three goals .
`` i am buzzing to sign a new contract , '' walker said .
`` i am just trying to get on with my football but i am glad to secure my future here and i can get on with playing football for the team . ''
walker 's new deal with the reds runs until 2021 .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: men found not guilty of megan bannister manslaughter
text: two men from leicester have been found not guilty of the gross negligence manslaughter of 16-year-old megan bannister .
the teenager 's body was found in the back of a car that had been involved in a crash in enderby earlier this year .
for legal reasons the judge directed the jury that there was no case to answer on the gross negligence manslaughter charge .
in court jason burder , from braunstone avenue , pleaded guilty to supplying ms bannister with a quantity of the drug mdma .
he also admitted three other drug offences .
adam king , from waltham avenue , pleaded guilty to being concerned in the supply of mdma .
author: Victoria Hicks
Reporter, East Midlands Today

documents.title: 'not many opportunities ' in newark
text: 'not many opportunities ' in newark

documents.title: twycross says goodbye to its elephants
text: twycross says goodbye to its elephants

Science, Environment & Rural Affairs Correspondent

documents.title: university link boosts derby ladies
text: university link boosts derby ladies

documents.title: rise in nottingham 's rough sleepers
text: almost 600 people have been found sleeping rough on the streets of nottingham in the last year , according to a charity .
framework has said in the 12 months up to november it came across 576 people sleeping on the city 's streets , up from 490 in 2015-16 .
the charity added it came across 379 rough sleepers in the city in 2014-15 , 250 in 2013-14 and 192 in 2012-13 .
author: East Midlands Today

documents.title: bus running on nottingham-worksop rail route
text: east midlands trains tweets
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: afternoon racing at southwell
text: there is an eight-race meeting at southwell this afternoon .
the meet gets under way at 12:10 , with the final race at 15:40 .
luke morris , who is the leading jockey in the 2017-18 all-weather championship , is down to feature alongside 2008 grand national winner timmy murphy .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather affecting stately home 's grounds
text: chatsworth house tweets
please make sure to wear boots or wellies if you 're visiting us today , as the ground is wet in places .
thank-you for your patience as we work hard to park all cars safely .
hope the ground is a bit drier for our visit at the end of the week ; )
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man fined for failing to clean up land
text: the owner of this `` untidy '' farm in whetstone has been ordered to pay a fine and court costs of nearly £ 5,000 .
in may 2016 , blaby district council issued peter thomas with a community protection warning after they received complaints about the land off enderby road .
the land contained broken down containers , vehicle parts , car tyres , as well as piles of bricks , rubble and refuse .
the notice required the 69-year-old , from new bridge road in glen parva , to remove the waste items .
he failed to do this , so the council prosecuted him for non-compliance with the notice .
leicester magistrates ' court found thomas guilty and ordered him to pay a fine of £ 1,500 and full costs of £ 3,300.38 .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: derby-based experts to help make commerical electric plane
text: experts from derby-based manufacturer rolls-royce are to be part of an `` exciting '' collaborative project to develop an electric-hybrid plane .
the project , being run in conjunction with airbus and siemens , could see the aircraft on a test flight as soon as 2020 .
rolls-royce has said its east midlands-based experts will help in developing the electronics and will also support the modification and integration of the motor into the aircraft .
paul stein , the company 's chief technology officer , said : `` this is an exciting time for us .
`` this technological advancement will result in rolls-royce creating the world 's most powerful flying generator . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

the little mix gig at the 3aaa county ground follows their performance at donington park this summer .
the # glorydaystour might be over but we 're so excited to announce that the little mix summer hits tour 2018 is cominggg to the uk !
tickets are out this thursday at 9:30am gmt , so get ready get set x the girls

documents.title: 'rare ' derby county programme sells for £ 1,300
text: a `` unique '' football programme has fetched more than £ 1,000 at auction .
the programme , for a match between derby county and hearts in september 1937 , smashed its pre-auction estimate of £ 150-180 , making £ 1,300 .
alistair lofley , from hansons auctioneers in etwall , said : `` the price could have gone even higher because of the scarcity value .
`` i have been collecting football programmes since i was eight or nine years old and have 25,000 derby county programmes but i have never seen this one before .
`` fellow derby county memorabilia collectors also told me they had never seen it before .
it may be the only one in existence . ''
mr lofley said the programme was made for a friendly match at the baseball ground to raise money for the red cross .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: knives sold to underage children
text: an undercover operation in derby found nearly half of shops tested sold knives to underage children .
child volunteers were used by derbyshire police , trading standards and the city council to test retailers earlier this month .
five out of the eleven shops sold knives to children as young as 13 .

all of the stores , who we are not naming at this stage , have now been re-visited and strong words of advice passed , along with a promise that they will be tested again and if the situation is repeated legal action will be taken . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : forecast for the east midlands
text: here 's what the weather has in store for tuesday .
author: Alex Hamilton
BBC Weather

documents.title: police hunt sports car driver over alleged hit-and-run
text: police are continuing to appeal for witnesses to a suspected hit-and-run , in which two young women were injured .
derbyshire police has released this image of a white sports car it believes hit the women from behind in dronfield , on friday 10 november .
the collision happened on church street near to the junction of lea road in the town .
one woman suffered head and foot injuries while the other suffered bruising to her right side , leg and foot .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: motorway delays causing 'severe traffic ' on a46
text: # leicester motorway news the usual busy patch is causing delays on the approach to j21a on the m1 soutbound and through to the turn for j21 .
this is unfortunately causing severe traffic , motorway bound ' on all of the a46 currently .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: magna park expansion plan 'called in '
text: councillors will now reconsider the approval of a planning application to expand the magna park storage and distribution centre near lutterworth .
a decision made last week to approve plans by idi gazeley has been `` called-in '' to be reconsidered at the next full council meeting on 11 december .
the other expansion plan by developers db symmetry is unaffected .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: newark 'the worst place to grow up poor '
text: the east midlands is the english region with the worst outcomes for those from disadvantaged backgrounds , according to a new report .
the study , by the social mobility commission , ranked local authorities and looked at children 's life chances based on their backgrounds .
in newark , nottinghamshire , the report claims only 43 % of children are ready for school when they start reception , compared with 52 % nationally .
by adulthood only 21 % are in professional or managerial roles , compared with 51 % in oxford .
jenny hodgkinson , head teacher of a primary school in the town , said : `` there 's a lot of challenges facing families at the moment .
`` they want to do the best for their children and they work ever so hard but they do n't always have the resources to do what they need to . ''
education secretary justine greening said the findings underlined `` the importance of focusing our efforts in more disadvantaged areas where we can make the biggest difference '' .
author: Judith Burns & Adina Campbell
BBC News

documents.title: puel : foxes wo n't target kane
text: the leicester city boss has told the bbc he is n't making plans to specifically mark harry kane in tonight 's match against tottenham .
the striker has scored 40 goals in 39 appearances for spurs this calendar year but claude puel said concentrating on kane allows other players too much space .
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: peaty on sports personality of the year shortlist
text: adam peaty has been nominated for bbc sports personality of the year 2017 .
peaty won two world titles and broke his own world record twice in one day at the world aquatic championships in hungary in july .
the former city of derby swimmer , who now trains at loughborough university , retained his 50m and 100m breaststroke titles in budapest .
this is the fourth time that peaty has been nominated for sports personality of the year .
he finished 11th in 2015 and 2016 and 10th in 2014 .
the full list of contenders for sports personality of the year 2017 can be found here .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : latest from the region 's roads
text: here 's the latest from the region 's roads :
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: good morning : welcome to today 's live updates
text: good morning and welcome along to tuesday across derbyshire , leicestershire , nottinghamshire and rutland .
amy woodfield and i will be here until later bringing you the best of the region 's news , sport , weather and travel .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live
